p: A lot of our understanding of BAT functioning comes from rodent studies. In mice, the interscapular BAT (IBAT) is the primary BAT depot, while brown adipocytes are also present in the supraclavicular region (scBAT). Several mice depots with topological similarities to human BAT-like and beige depots were identified recently ( Zhang et al., 2018). Another study has shown that the gene expression pattern of mice scBAT was similar to that of human scBAT ( Mo et al., 2017).
